question: Who won bronze at 2017 Indoor Archery World Cup Stage 2 tournament?
explanation: Deepika Kumari from India has won bronze medal at the Indoor Archery World Cup Stage 2 that concluded in Bangkok, Thailand on December 3, 2017. She defeated 13th seeded Sayana Tsyrempilova of Russia 7-3 in the women's recurve bronze play-off.
